## City Hall

## 207 W. 2nd St Grandview, WA

Grandview City Hall  ~ 207 W. 2nd Street ~ Grandview, Washington 98930 Business Hours: Monday-Friday (excluding Holidays) 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. CLOSED from Noon to 1:00 p.m.
